rationale: Primary maths (Y1) with concrete stage requiring physical manipulatives (Bead strings (100 beads, colour change every 10), Counters). AI delivers instruction; facilitator sets up materials.
notes: Concrete resources: Bead strings (100 beads, colour change every 10), Counters, Interlocking cubes, Buttons and shells for counting collections, Number track (1-20, then 1-100)

rationale: Primary maths (Y1) with concrete stage requiring physical manipulatives (Pairs of socks, shoes or gloves, 5p coins). AI delivers instruction; facilitator sets up materials.
